camera.description: To better connect with you, the care plan you select require us to send you the notifications. Join the wellness tracker program so Ceras can continue to update your activities.
camera.title: Camera

locations.description: Granting location permissions allows the app to communicate your location to your doctor or care team in the case of emergency.
locations.title: Location Permissions

notifications.description: Notifications may include important health alerts and reminders when something looks off.  It's simple to change them at any time in settings.
notifications.title: Push Notifications

always.description: Be connected to your doctor. Have peace of mind while your care team monitors your health 24x7. we have your healthcare experience covered.
always.title: Always Connected

conditions.description: Whether you have a minor acute issue or a chronic condition, let your doctor proactively manage conditions from the convenience of your home.
conditions.title: Conditions Managed

health.description: Your information is instantly uploaded from your device and sent to your doctor.
health.title: Health Monitoring
